entry.overview: Next generation sliders, teasers and product tiles
entry.description:
This release introduces a refactor for slider-based components, like image-teasers and products-carousels, as well as the new structure and architecture for product tile. It gets rid of a Swiper library, replacing JS-based slider with modern CSS solutions and simplyfing product-tile, thanks to CSS Grid possibilities, which gives us more flexibility of styling tile per project, without element's duplication, overwriting or complex layout changes. Note that these changes drop some of the functionalities of slider elements and change strucutures of product tiles and teasers, so they need much attention during the udpate. Chages are spread across many MageSuite modules.
More details can be found in: https://creativestyle.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CSHOP/pages/2135359509/Next+generation+Teaser+Slider+and+Product+Tile

Clear global messages before adding product to the cart
entry.description: In case when search result return single product, there is a redirect to product detail page performed on enter key. After that the global message is displayed via messages. If product will be added to the cart this message will be cached and displayed within the offcanvas mini cart along with the next message about product being added to the cart. Similar issue can be observed when product is added to the wishlist and right after that product is added to the cart. This fix clears the global messages right before fetching new messages that are going to be displayed within the offcanvas minicart.
